titles.title: A resolution recognizing the significant contribution of the Country Music Association and designating September 25, 2018, "Country Music Association Day".
A resolution recognizing the significant contribution of the Country Music Association and designating September 25, 2018, "Country Music Association Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Designates September 25, 2018, as Country Music Association Day.
Recognizes the significant contributions of the Country Music Association over 60 years.
